# TokenFlight Embed - llms-full.txt

Structured full index for LLM retrieval.
Base URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai

## Home

### TokenFlight
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/
- Slug: /
- Description: Interactive playground for cross-chain token swap Web Components.
- Summary: Interactive playground for cross-chain token swap Web Components.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/index.mdx

## Getting Started

### Getting Started
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/getting-started/
- Slug: getting-started
- Description: Install the TokenFlight Embed SDK and render your first widget.
- Summary: Before using the HTML tags, register the custom elements once in your application entry point:
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/getting-started.mdx

## Guides

### Error Handling
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/error-handling/
- Slug: guides/error-handling
- Description: Handle errors from TokenFlight widgets using callbacks, error codes, and the TokenFlightError class.
- Summary: The simplest way to handle errors is through callbacks:
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/guides/error-handling.mdx

### Internationalization (i18n)
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/i18n/
- Slug: guides/i18n
- Description: Localize TokenFlight widgets with built-in language packs for English, Chinese, Japanese, and Korean.
- Summary: TokenFlight includes built-in translations for five locales. Language packs are lazy-loaded — only the active locale is bundled into the page.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/guides/i18n.mdx

### Theming & Custom Colors
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/theming/
- Slug: guides/theming
- Description: Customize the look of TokenFlight widgets with built-in themes, auto dark mode, and CSS variable overrides.
- Summary: TokenFlight widgets ship with light and dark themes, plus an auto mode that follows the user's system preference. You can further override any color via setCustomColors() or CSS variables.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/guides/theming.mdx

### Token Pre-selection
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/token-preselection/
- Slug: guides/token-preselection
- Description: Pre-fill source and destination tokens using object literals, CAIP-10 strings, or JSON.
- Summary: You can pre-select the source token (fromToken), destination token (toToken), or both, so users land on a ready-to-go swap screen.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/guides/token-preselection.mdx

### Custom Wallet Adapter
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/guides/wallet-adapter/
- Slug: guides/wallet-adapter
- Description: Build your own wallet adapter to connect any wallet provider to TokenFlight widgets.
- Summary: TokenFlight widgets don't bundle a wallet — they talk to wallets through an adapter interface. Official adapters exist for Privy, AppKit, and Thirdweb, but you can build your own for any provider.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/guides/wallet-adapter.mdx

## Examples

### Chat App
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/chat-app/
- Slug: examples/chat-app
- Description: Send and receive crypto payments inside a chat conversation with an embedded receive widget.
- Summary: Messaging apps can embed payment request widgets directly into the conversation — users pay from any chain without switching apps.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/examples/chat-app.mdx

### Receive Widget
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/receive/
- Slug: examples/receive
- Description: Configuration options and usage examples for the TokenFlight Receive widget.
- Summary: The Receive widget lets users purchase a fixed amount of a specific token. Configure the target token and amount, and the widget handles chain selection and payment routing.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/examples/receive.mdx

### Social Feed
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/social-feed/
- Slug: examples/social-feed
- Description: Embed TokenFlight swap and receive widgets directly in a social media timeline.
- Summary: Social platforms can embed cross-chain swap widgets directly in the feed — users interact with DeFi without leaving the timeline.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/examples/social-feed.mdx

### Swap Widget
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/swap/
- Slug: examples/swap
- Description: Configuration options, callbacks, and usage examples for the TokenFlight Swap widget.
- Summary: The Swap widget provides a cross-chain token swap interface. Users select source and destination tokens, enter an amount, and execute the swap.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/examples/swap.mdx

### Vanilla JS Demo
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/vanilla/
- Slug: examples/vanilla
- Description: A complete example using TokenFlight widgets with plain HTML and JavaScript.
- Summary: This demo shows both the Swap and Receive widgets running with vanilla JavaScript — no framework required. Use the theme buttons to switch between dark and light mode.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/examples/vanilla.mdx

### Wallet App
- URL: https://embed.tokenflight.ai/examples/wallet-app/
- Slug: examples/wallet-app
- Description: Add cross-chain swap functionality to a crypto wallet with an embedded swap widget.
- Summary: Wallet applications can integrate a full cross-chain swap experience as a native tab — no need to build swap infrastructure from scratch.
- Source: apps/docs/src/content/docs/examples/wallet-app.mdx
